text: I hope this will be useful to others!

text: Very nice. Perhaps it could be included in the BioJulia org? There has been talks about splitting VCF out in a separate package for a long time, but noone has had the time to do it

text:
FYI, in the not-so-distant future, a new version of Automa will be released, which will break your package. See this issue: <https://github.com/BioJulia/GeneticVariation.jl/issues/28>
It would be great if you could fix it
